description: Mark Dalton seduces the camera... soaking in the sun and stroking his hard cock as he plays with his muscles... teasing the camera with his ass-wiggling it, thrusting it out, running his hands over it... and then fade to the following: Drew Sumrok, Jason Ridge and Erik Rhodes in a flip-flop three-way that, by the end, leaves no hole unplugged and will leave you breathless.
title: Super Soaked, Scene #02
